TermDefinition.DefinitionText: Radiation therapy given by injecting a radioactive substance into the bloodstream or a body cavity, or by swallowing it. This substance is not sealed in a container.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "unsealed internal radiation therapy"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "radioterapia interna no sellada"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Radioterapia que se administra al inyectar una sustancia radiactiva en el torrente sanguíneo o una cavidad del cuerpo, o al ingerirla. Esta sustancia no está sellada en un envase.
